Section.Catchline: Inactive status; reactivation of inactive license.

Subsection.Text: A barber’s license that has become inactive may be reactivated under s. 476.154 upon application to the department.

The board shall promulgate rules relating to licenses which have become inactive and for the renewal of inactive licenses. The board shall prescribe by rule a fee not to exceed $100 for the reactivation of an inactive license and a fee not to exceed $50 for the renewal of an inactive license.
